alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 2:29PM CST until January 10 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow and hazardous travel expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches away from the lake. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall amounts expected in western Lake county with much lower amounts near the lake.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
